title: Brotherhood 2004 DVDR R4 NTSC ENG
description:
In the same vein of Saving Private Ryan and Band Of Brohters arrives this Korean box office success. From the director of Shiri: Terrorist Mission comes this epic tale of two brothers. Jin-tae, a shoemaker, has worked tirelessly to afford the college of his younger brother Jin-seok. However, your desires and dreams are put aside when the two are forced to join the army against their will. Far from home and family, Jin-tae vows to protect Jin-seok from any danger and at any cost. At the crucial moment of the battle, fate intervenes, forcing their bonds of faith, love and trust to be tested several times in this war drama full of tension and action. 

Title in Brazil: The Brotherhood of War
